ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Hunters: The Shadowlands
ComicInfo.Summary:
The BEING has been freed from his eternal prison and the Grimm Universe trembles in fear. As The Being journey's with Samira to find the one person that resides in the dark dimension who holds the key to his release from the shadowlands, Sela and the Hunters finds themselves face to face against of colony of demons intent on freeing one of their own even if it means tearing our wayward heroes apart. Don't miss out on the prequel to the Grimm Universe event series of the year by the Wonderland and Fly writer, Raven Gregory. - Unleashed tie-in!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-12 21:40:29. [Issue ID 418998]
